CitySettingSqlResource.SelectIncludeAll: SELECT [CitySettings].Id,[CitySettings].InitOpeningDataState,[CitySettings].City_Id,[CitySettings].FocusCapture,[CitySettings].EnablePurchaseRequisition,[CitySettings].IsOpenProductionDate,OnlineState,[Orgs].Name Name FROM dbo.CitySettings WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.Orgs WITH(NOLOCK) ON [CitySettings].City_Id=[Orgs].Id
CitySettingSqlResource.GetByCityId: SELECT Id,InitOpeningDataState,OnlineState,CreateTime,LastUpdateTime,City_Id,FocusCapture,EnablePurchaseRequisition,IsOpenProductionDate FROM dbo.CitySettings WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE City_Id=@CityId
